      • playCard

        public project.model.Card playCard​(java.util.List<Player> playersList,
                                   Trick t)
        Prompt player to play a card. Calls function that allows player to input card that they want to play. Remove card from player's hand if inputted card exists.
        Parameters:
        playersList - list of players in order that cards are played
        t - instance of the current trick
        Returns:
        cardToPlay the card the player has decided to play

      • placeBid

                                                                        Trick t)
        Allows player to input desired bid amount based on list of allowed bids.
        Parameters:
        bidsAllowed - List of integers of bids that player can place
        t - instance of the current trick
        Returns:
        output hashmap of player's name and bid amount

      • inputBidAmount

        public int inputBidAmount​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> bidsAllowed)
        Allows player to input the bid amount they want to bid. Validates if input is a valid input (positive integer bigger or equals to 0).
        Parameters:
        bidsAllowed - List of integer of bids allowed
        Returns:
        int of bid amount

      • inputCardPlay

        public project.model.Card inputCardPlay​(project.model.Suit trumpSuit,

        Allows player to input rank and suit of the card they want to play from their hand. Validates if card exists in player's hand.

        leadingSuit - leading suit
